comment.body:
I tried to create my own blog and chose to "clone" this one. 
However, I can "add new post" ut I can't write anything on it. 
Is there a tutorial for this?

When I try the alternative method and write: "python zeronet.py siteCreate"
I get the following problem "ImportError: No module named gevent"
If I want to post images on my blog, do I have to upload them first to a server? Can I only display images that are already public?
